overview: Marc Cardinael joined BIP in April 2001. Marc has a thorough industrial background in the automotive industry. During his 11 year international career with the Delphi Automotive Systems group, he headed a number of important international projects leading to successful production launches. Marc graduated in Mechanical Engineering and Industrial Management from the Catholic University in Leuven, Belgium. He holds a degree of Certified International Investment Analyst of the Zurich-based ACIIA organization. In 2007, Marc followed the International Executive Program at INSEAD, Paris. Marc is also the owner of several patents.
